module.name: Call Forward
module.changelog: *2.11.5* Generate license file *2.11.1* Removed the ability to callforward other xtns by default. *2.11.0.1* #6857 related *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4758 *2.9.0.0* #4651 *2.8.0.4* #4578 *2.8.0.3* #4294 *2.8.0.2* #4114, #4115, #3605 *2.8.0.1* #4214 *2.8.0.0* #4116, #4105 again *2.7.0.2* #4103, #4104, #4105 *2.7.0.1* localizations *2.7.0.0* #4047 CF toggle + devstate and hint additions *2.6.0.1* Added publisher/lic *2.6.0.0* #3650, #3651, localizations *2.5.0.1* localization fixes *2.5.0* localization fixes, Swedish *2.4.0* bumped for 2.4 *1.1.2* #2321 fixed CF AMPUSER(number) issue, syntax problem *1.1.1.2* changed categories *1.1.1.1* bump for rc1 *1.1.1* changed ${CALLERID(number)} to ${AMPUSER} to accomodate CID number masquerading *1.1* First release for 2.2
